Thank you for raising this crucial point, Student_A. At School_C, we fundamentally believe that true academic rigor is unsustainable without robust support for student well-being. Our philosophy is rooted in the principle of 'Excellence through Balance.'

Academically, we maintain high standards, but we actively counter burnout by integrating mandatory 'Wellness Hours' into the weekly schedule, dedicated solely to physical activity, mindfulness, or personalized counseling sessions. We have a full-time, dedicated team of three licensed mental health counselors who offer confidential, easily accessible support and preventative workshops.

Furthermore, our faculty are trained in trauma-informed teaching practices and flexible grading policies that prioritize deep learning over punitive stress. We track student load closely to ensure a challenging but manageable pace. We view mental health support not as a separate service, but as an essential pillar supporting high achievement. We are committed to making School_C a place where you can achieve your maximum potential while feeling supported and healthy.
